name: Lover's Vengeance
source: Pathfinder #17: A Memory of Darkness pg. 62
components: V, M (a piece of jewelry worth at least 100 gp)
duration: up to 1 day/level (D) or until discharged
text: You inspire yourself or a lover to a vengeful rage against a chosen enemy, who must be a creature that has wronged you in some way. If cast on you, the next time you are in combat with that enemy, you gain the benefits of a rage spell. If cast on a lover, he or she gains the benefits of a rage spell the next time the lover is in combat against your enemy. This variant of the spell must be cast within 1 hour of an intimate encounter with the target. The rage effect lasts 1 round per level. If the creature that triggers the rage effect is one of your lovers or ex-lovers, the benefits granted by the rage spell double. This spell counts as a contingency spell on the target for the purpose of multiple contingent effects. Worshipers of Calistria are fond of using this spell, and many keep the effect running whenever possible.
duration_zh: 最多1天/等级 (D) 或 直到释放
savingThrow_zh: 意志, 通过则无效 (无害)
text_zh: 选择一位敌人，你激起了自己或一位爱人内心复仇的怒火，针对这位曾经以某种方式辜负过你的「爱人」。如果妳施放在自己身上，下次你与该名敌人同处于一场战斗中时，你获得狂暴术(rage)的效果。如果放在一位爱人身上，他(她)在下一次战斗中与你的敌人交战时，获得狂暴术的效果。这法术的多样使用必须施放在1小时内有过经密接触的目标身上。狂暴术的效果持续1轮/等级。在决定目标身上多重触发效果时，本法术算做一次触发术(contingency)。
